scripts.dev: concurrently --names="Frontend(Web),Backend(API)" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" -c blue,cyan
scripts.generate: concurrently --names="Frontend(Web),Backend(API)" "npm run generate:client" "npm run generate:server" -c blue,cyan
scripts.test: concurrently --names="Frontend(Web),Backend(API)" "npm run test:client" "npm run test:server" -c blue,cyan
scripts.typecheck: concurrently --names="Frontend(Web),Backend(API)" "npm run typecheck:client" "npm run typecheck:server" -c blue,cyan
scripts.lint: concurrently --names="Frontend(Web),Backend(API)" "npm run lint:client" "npm run lint:server" -c blue,cyan
